archimate:Requirement.name: NC.1.4.5: Untrusted devices — those that do not meet minimum security configuration requirements (i.e. fail a system integrity check) — should be automatically connected to an isolated network (e.g. a quarantine area such as a sandbox or container) where their configuration can be updated but no other changes are allowed.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
